New Records: The New York Yankees clinched their 32nd straight winning season.
Key Match Events: Clarke Schmidt and Nestor Cortes combined on a four-hitter.
Wells grounded out to second, Torres scored, Soto to third in the 1st inning.
Judge scored on a throwing error by catcher Bethancourt, Chisholm Jr. stole third in the 6th inning.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was held at Wrigley Field with an attendance of 40,080.
The game lasted 2 hours and 34 minutes.
